Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory147.png'}
{3: 'F.O.S. Military College, 6:00 PM'}

{3: 'As the graduation test nears its conclusion, some people display visible signs of anxiety, some adopt a facade of nonchalance, while others seem genuinely at ease as they have already decided their future paths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: 'Ah... This is it... Seems like getting a perfect score is impossible at this point.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Freeman', 3: "That's impossible right from the start, isn't it? Otherwise, they wouldn't make points rankings the main criteria for this test.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: "I just really don't want to admit it, you know... It's like there were several times when I felt like they were just straight-up reading my mind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bieble', 3: 'How is it possible for the test designer to predict our actions so precisely? Every tactical strategy we came up with created a new challenge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bieble', 3: 'We only survived through improvisation and constant adjustment to our strategies.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: 'That\'s likely the whole point of this test. You know how the saying goes... "You have to be there to know."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: 'The test designer probably tried to recreate that experience as accurately as possible through the simulation.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: 'Why are you acting like you have nothing to fear?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: "Because I've pretty much confirmed which force I'll be joining in the future?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: 'Sigh... So special treatment for the top A student, huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: 'Special treatment...? If you think so.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haniff lets out a sarcastic laugh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: "Forget it. I really don't want to think about it anymore... By the way, Freeman, where were you a few days ago? You used to be the type who never missed a class.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Freeman', 3: 'Uh... I just went for a physical check-up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: 'A physical check-up? Are you sick?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Freeman remains silent, withholding any response, while Haniff, abruptly reminded of something, shifts the conversation to a different topic.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: "Speaking of which, you guys haven't seen Rolla around today, have you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: "I heard that she passed the Science Council's test and has been busy applying for an internship there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bieble', 3: "That's what my brother said.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: 'You have a brother?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: "...He's always smarter than me, and my family loves to compare the two of us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bieble presses his lips together with a disgruntled look on his face.'}
{2: 'Bieble', 3: "I just can't let it go like this! I can't beat him in terms of intelligence, so I'll have to make a greater contribution somewhere else!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seemingly having thought of something, Bieble has a renewed sense of motivation emerging within him.'}
{2: 'Bieble', 3: "Just you wait and see, cunning test designer! We'll uncover your tricks and outsmart you!", 4: '1'}

{3: "Bieble throws a flurry of punches in the air toward his imaginary foe. Freeman shakes his head in resignation, while Haniff proposes hacking into the school system to uncover the test designer's identity."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Meanwhile, Rolla nervously knocks on the Science Council's door."}
{3: 'Despite their divergent paths in the future, they are now just a group of young people with distinct personalities and thoughts.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Instructor', 3: 'You were really helpful this time. Thanks to you, the sandbox simulation was incredibly close to a real combat situation.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's what I'm supposed to do.", 3: '53'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'But it seems that the graduates this year have been holding quite a grudge against you.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Gazing at the young person sitting across the desk, the instructor can't help but indulge in some light teasing after recalling the old days in school."}
{2: 'To safeguard my reputation...', 3: '56'}
{2: 'Instructor, please help me keep this secret.', 3: '57'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'Hehe, you still have a way of making people not dislike you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old man shakes his head, a smile lingering on his lips, before his tone shifts back to seriousness.'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'So, in your opinion, can they pass the final test?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Probabilistically speaking, I can't provide a 100% guarantee.", 3: '61'}
{2: "But I'm willing to believe in their potential."}
